welcome_message_body: Welcome to Darjeeling, a charming hill town known for its breathtaking views of the Himalayas and its renowned tea plantations. We invite you to explore our unique culture, delicious cuisine, and stunning natural beauty during your visit. Enjoy your time in this enchanting city!
